name: caddy
description: Caddy is a powerful HTTP server designed with automatic HTTPS, easy configuration, and excellent performance out of the box. Itâ€™s extensible, production-ready, and popular among developers for hosting websites and APIs securely.
features: Automatic HTTPS: SSL certificates obtained and renewed automatically. Zero-config security.
Easy Configuration: Simple, intuitive config file format. No complexity.
High Performance: Excellent performance out of the box. Fast and efficient.
Reverse Proxy: Built-in reverse proxy capabilities. Flexible routing.
Extensible: Plugin system for custom functionality. Unlimited possibilities.
Production-Ready: Battle-tested for hosting websites and APIs. Reliable service.
Cross-Platform: Works on Linux, Windows, and more. Universal compatibility.
